txt.en: 'So you are not happy with your mahogany bay horse? Well, I can offer you an exchange, as I would not want one of my horses where it was not desired. However, this is not a decision to take lightly, so I will give you a moment to think about this.\n\n'If you are really sure you wish to exchange your mahogany bay horse, speak to me again, and I will give you a receipt in return. You can then exchange the receipt for a mahogany bay horse or pony.'

'So you have decided you want to exchange your mahogany bay after all? So be it. Look over this receipt and tell me if it looks fine to you.\n\n'And this time, I hope you are more sure of your choice. Choosing a horse should not be something done lightly!'
Cam Applewood has told you that you can exchange your mahogany bay horse for another mahogany bay horse or pony.
Give your mahogany bay horse to Cam

Cam Applewood is at the Hengstacer Farm, north of the Bree Festival Grounds.\n\nCam suggested you take a moment to consider whether or not you wish to exchange your horse. If you decide you do want to exchange your horse, you should speak to Cam again.
